name: Shipwrecked (KhashayarJan)
description:
Simple prototype for a ship strategy game

Each ship has weapons with different damage and different ranges (green cones)

The goal is to reach top right corner of the map.

control your ship by dragging with left click on mouse. After choosing destination, press Start Turn button. Your ship (and enemy ships) move and shoot automatically during the turn.

move map by dragging right click on mouse.
